name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: OwlApply - Autofill & Automate Your Job Applications

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: OwlApply compares job listings with your resume, auto-fills forms, and creates custom cover letter PDF for each application.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
OwlApply is your AI-powered job search assistant 🦉, designed to streamline and optimize the entire application process, helping you land your dream job faster. Whether you’re applying through Workday, LinkedIn, Greenhouse, Indeed, or other platforms, OwlApply makes every step easier and more effective in your job search. Here’s how it works:

⚡ Smart Form Autofill: OwlApply’s AI saves your personal details and automatically fills job application forms, so you don’t have to! ⏳ Say goodbye to tedious manual entries.

📝 AI-Powered Cover Letter Generation (PDF): Need a cover letter? 🖊 OwlApply generates a personalized, tailored cover letter in PDF format with just one click, ensuring your application stands out in every job posting. 🎯 If you’re not satisfied with the generated cover letter, OwlApply allows you to regenerate it based on your preferences, giving you full control over your application. 🔄

📄 Resume and Cover Letter Auto-Upload: No more manually attaching documents! OwlApply automatically uploads your resume and cover letter when you’re filling out job applications, ensuring your materials are always ready. 📎

📊 Resume Analysis and Optimization: Want to improve your resume? OwlApply compares your resume to the job posting, identifies missing skills, and provides valuable suggestions to optimize your resume for each position. 🚀

💡 Instant AI Career Assistance: Get real-time advice! OwlApply allows you to chat directly with an AI career expert from the job listing page without the hassle of uploading extra details. Your career coach is just a click away! 🎓

🔒 Protect Your Data: We take your privacy seriously. 🛡 OwlApply is built with strict data privacy standards, ensuring that all your personal information is secure and protected. You can trust us to safeguard your data while you focus on your job search.

⏱ Efficiency & Time-Saving: OwlApply eliminates the repetitive parts of job applications, giving you the freedom to focus on finding the right opportunities instead of dealing with administrative tasks. 💼

With OwlApply, you can navigate the job search smarter, faster, and with personalized AI support at every step! 🎉 Start automating your job applications today and take the stress out of your career hunt! 💪


***By downloading this extension, you are agreeing to our Terms of Service (https://www.owlapply.com/terms-of-service) and our Privacy Policy (https://www.owlapply.com/privacy-policy).
